ValidationRule.description: If Current Customer is "yes", then Services used today, and Contact/Customer Name and Type, is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL (Current_Customer__c, "Yes"),
ISBLANK ( Services_Used_Today__c), ISBLANK ( Contact_Customer_Name__c), ISPICKVAL ( Contact_Customer_Type__c, ''))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Since this is a current customer, please choose Contact/Customer Name, Contact Customer Type, and their Services used today.
